text.title: Fish and chips - Salvacena in 10 minuti - Benedetta Parodi Official
text.p: Welcome to my kitchen are you ready
for another dinner saver a classic of
English cuisine that can be made in 10
minutes I'm talking about fish and chips
that we will then accompany with
a slightly spicy marinara sauce
at least we'll try
In 10 minutes Here you go So the most
complicated thing is that the potatoes I want to
